comment: Pop quizzes on the readings. Extra credit if you have perfect attendance. 2 ESSAYS!!: he picks 2 random topics and you choose one to write on, and I got 100 on both by just writing my notes word for word. 2 exams, midterm + final which isnt accumulative and were both exactly like the powerpoints
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria
